lead_paragraph: Mr. Scarpelli was known for both satirizing and celebrating the average Italian’s capacity for survival under adverse circumstances.
snippet: Mr. Scarpelli was known for both satirizing and celebrating the average Italian’s capacity for survival under adverse circumstances.

headline.main: Furio Scarpelli, Screenwriter of Italian Comedies, Dies at 90
headline.seo: Furio Scarpelli, Screenwriter of Italian Comedies, Dies at 90
